topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d62e236368723f93412e00#post_54d62e236368723f93412e00

Seeing as how the entire romance comes down to "hey, even if your husband ignores and cheats on you, it's okay as long as _you_ love him" and that there's an entire song based on the female lead saying how glad she'd be to pop out babies and make dinner, all unironically...I think it's safe to say that it hasn't aged well.

Oh yeah, he does. He did It's  Wonderful Life for Christmas.
